Houston is one of America's fastest-growing metros, adding nearly 200,000 residents in the past year alone. Vouch Mobile helps new Houstonians and longtime residents alike stay connected across this sprawling metro without the sprawling phone bill.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Houston

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Houston residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the metro area. With 99% population coverage and average speeds of 58 Mbps, you'll stay connected wherever you go in the Houston area.

As part of the 7.4 million population metro, Houston benefits from AT&T's ongoing network investment and 5G expansion.

Benefits

Why Houston Residents Choose Vouch

Houston's average phone bill of $119/month adds up fast in a city this big—Vouch cuts that by 75%.

Whether you're stuck on I-10, working in the Energy Corridor, or exploring the Museum District, you need coverage that spans Greater Houston.

No credit check means Rice students, new Houston residents, and energy sector workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T provides 5G coverage at Minute Maid Park and Toyota Center, with expanding coverage across the metro.

Who Benefits

Vouch Mobile for Houston Locals

Energy Workers

Houston's energy sector demands constant connectivity. From downtown offices to refineries, Vouch keeps you connected.

Medical Center Staff

The Texas Medical Center is the world's largest. Healthcare workers need affordable, reliable coverage.

Commuters

Houston's sprawl means long commutes. Unlimited data for navigation and entertainment makes drives easier.

New Residents

Houston adds 1,000+ new residents weekly. No credit check means instant signup for newcomers.

FAQ

Houston Coverage Questions

Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Houston

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% coverage across the Houston metro area using AT&T's network. From Downtown to The Woodlands, Sugar Land to Pearland, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout Greater Houston.

Houston residents pay an average of $119/month for phone service. With Vouch at $30/month, you could save over $1,068 per year—enough to cover several Texans games or a weekend in Galveston.

Yes! AT&T 5G is available throughout Houston, with enhanced 5G+ coverage at major venues like Minute Maid Park and Toyota Center. Coverage extends across the inner loop and into the suburbs.

Yes! You'll have coverage throughout the METRO Houston system, including METRORail light rail and bus routes. The RideMetro app works seamlessly with Vouch's unlimited data.

Absolutely. Houston's 10,000+ square mile metro demands consistent coverage. AT&T's network spans from Katy to Baytown, keeping you connected across Greater Houston's entire footprint.

No credit check required. Whether you're a UH student, a new Houston transplant, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly with no credit inquiry.
